meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Wolley Larry Sein, Jr. Seth Davis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1622.

td.p: John Wolley, a software engineer from Littleton, Colorado
Larry Sein, Jr., a computer consultant originally from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Seth Davis, an environmental lawyer from Croton-on-Hudson, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,200)

tr.td: CLASSICAL MUSIC
FOLKLORE
FILMS OF THE '40s
ITALY
TRANSPORTATION
WILDE
